name: Li Yu Bei (leeight)
body:
leeight@gmail.com  
+86-152-021-33250  
Shanghai, China  
http://twitter.com/leeight  
Senior Software Engineer @ Baidu, Inc.

### Skills
1. Proficiency in JavaScript and familiar with HTML DOM scripting.
2. Familiar with HTML4/5, CSS and web standards, and skilled in designing web standards compliant web site.
3. Familiar with HTTP and other common Internet protocols.
4. Ability to write high-performance, reusable code for UI components.
5. Experience developing rich applications with HTML/CSS/JS.

### Work Experiences

#### July 2007 - Present (Baidu, Inc)

I joined Baidu in 2007 as a Front-End Developer after graduated from [Xi'an JiaoTong University](http://www.xjtu.edu.cn).

* Business Projects.
  * [Advertise Management Platform](http://jn.baidu.com)
  * [Baidu Japanese Search](http://video.baidu.jp)
  * [Baidu Space & Baidu Friends](http://hi.baidu.com)
* Libraries & Frameworks.
  * [Tangram: Baidu Frontend Library](http://tangram.baidu.com)
  * [EBiz RIA Framework](https://github.com/erik168/ER)
* Platforms & Utility Tools.
  * [Fe utils](http://github.com/leeight/feutils)
  * [Personal blog based on Markdown](http://leeight.appspot.com)
  * [Personal Presentations](http://www.slideshare.net/leeight)
* Member of EBiz Technical Committee.

### Keywords
* Front-End : JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Browser Compatibility Issues, less, bootstrap, ...
* Linux : Ubuntu, Gentoo, ArchLinux
* Other Languages : Python, PHP, C, C++, ...

### Contributions to The Open Source
1. http://code.baidu.com/p/hi-linux Baidu Hi (Instant Messenger) Linux standalone version, powered by wine.
2. Bubmit patches to google closure-compiler, [Issue 159], [Issue 358].
3. Contributor to https://github.com/BaiduFE/Tangram-base and https://github.com/CatChen/jsHelpers
4. Forked http://code.google.com/p/rietveld/ and add more features as a internal project.
